attributes.action: Incorporate self defence classes into PE lessons throughout schools
attributes.additional_details:
The world is rapidly changing. In many places, individuals, especially women & young people, are facing risks of physical harm or harassment within their communities, it is imperative that we equip our next generations with the skills necessary to navigate these dangers effectively.
Incorporating self-defence classes into the Physical Education (PE) curriculum for primary & secondary school-aged children is a forward-thinking solution.
attributes.background: Incorporate self defence classes into PE lessons for primary&secondary aged school children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce self-defence lessons into the PE curriculum in all secondary schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749166
